name: evdevkit
description: Developer toolkit for Evernode smart contract deployment

scripts.build: npm install && npm run lint && ncc build index.js -o dist/ && cp -r ./assets ./dist/assets
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && cp README.md dist && cp && npm publish ./dist
scripts.prepare: npm run build:bootstrap && mkdir -p ./assets && cp ./evernode-bootstrap-contract/build/bootstrap_contract ./assets/bootstrap_contract && cp ./evernode-bootstrap-contract/src/bootstrap_upgrade.sh ./assets/bootstrap_upgrade.sh
